name: Running Strike
summary: Running Strike is a real-time multi-player strategic game. You are running on randomly generated tracks to battle with other players, instantly. As a player, your mission is to guide our characters to overcome all obstacles along the track and win the game. With the help of items, skills and talent, you can choose the best strategy for each match. Players, join the world of Running Strike, lead our characters to success and be the Master of Running!
